mapper.update: update qa set q_checked=1 where q_num=#{q_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from qa where q_checked=0
select count(*) from orderdetail where o_num=#{o_num}

select count(*)
from review c, members m, mainorder o, hotel h, ( select o_num, listagg(r_type, ', ') within group (order by od_num) as r_type from ( select * from rooms r, orderdetail od where r.r_num = od.r_num ) group by o_num )op
where h.h_name like #{keyword} and c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = op.o_num and c.h_num=h.h_num
where m.m_nickname like #{keyword} and c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = op.o_num and c.h_num=h.h_num
where c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = op.o_num and c.h_num=h.h_num

select c.c_num, c.c_date, c.c_star, c.c_comment, m.m_nickname, o.o_checkin, o.o_checkout, op.r_type, h.h_name
from review c, members m, mainorder o, hotel h, ( select o_num, listagg(r_type, ', ') within group (order by od_num) as r_type from ( select * from rooms r, orderdetail od where r.r_num = od.r_num ) group by o_num )op
where h.h_name like #{keyword} and c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = op.o_num and c.h_num=h.h_num
where m.m_nickname like #{keyword} and c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = op.o_num and c.h_num=h.h_num
where c.m_num = m.m_num and c.o_num = o.o_num and o.o_num = op.o_num and c.h_num=h.h_num
